Text:
A Rumor of the declining value of paper bills ripples
through Midgar Kingdom.

As the rumor spreads, stores begin to only accept
payments in gold coins.

Panicked citizens rush to the banks to exchange their
bills.
Not this bank as well...

I hear they've been going around to every branch
exchanging bills since this morning...
Huh...?
What the...?!

"Temporarily closed due to...unforeseen
circumstances"?!
What the hell is going on?!
Then the rumors are true...

Our bills...aren't even worth the paper they're
printed on now!
So, it begins.
...Well then, I shall take my leave.

Still no leads on the source of the counterfeit
bills?

W-We still haven't located the printing factory...
But we've identified the mastermind behind it all.
It's Yukime!
What...?!
That White Tower vixen from the Lawless City.

Her Snow Fox Corporation carriages were used to
transport the exchanged gold coins. That company
was just a front for the White Tower.

The route they used is the same one we have been
investigating for the counterfeit operation—

(A coincidence? No, I knew she had taken up work as
a lady of the night.)
He hears the faint sound of a bell.
*gasp*
Eep!
Wh-What is going on...?!
Gettan becomes acutely aware of his surroundings.

Sensing a palpable hostility deep within those
walking the streets, he focuses his consciousness.
*gasp*
Stop...
Huh?
...Stop the carriage.

The Seven Shadows decide to keep the fact that John
Smith is Shadow just to themselves.

Their rationale is that if the troops knew, it would
strike a harsh blow to morale.

He exists in a realm nobody else could possibly hope
to reach...
That's why he doesn't need me anymore...
That's not true.

They've had this exact conversation several times
now.

Alpha's sunken into the depths of despair. She's in
no state to lead the Shadow Garden right now.

Even so, there's something Gamma needs to report.
She composes herself and then speaks.
The MCA's collapse is unstoppable.

Forced store closures have driven citizen anxiety to
all-time highs, leading to riots erupting at various
bank branches.

Our bank has also been swamped with customers
demanding exchanges, and we're struggling to keep
up...
Can we pull though?

If things continue this way, our bank vault will be
empty within days.

Even if we consolidate all our domestic and foreign
assets into our bank...
...we won't be able to withstand a credit collapse.
...I see.

But we'll be fine! If we can somehow reassure the
market, we can quash this chaos.

For example... Aha! Maybe we can showcase a massive
pile of gold coins...
Enough.
But...
That's...enough.

When the masses see the MCA go under, they'll know
there's no guarantee the damage will stop there. They
are both all too aware of that fact.

He's the one who decided to circulate the
counterfeits and cause the credit crisis.
This is what he wanted to happen.
He's cast us aside.

That... That's not true! Master Shadow would never
abandon us!
We just weren't able to live up to his expectations.
*gasp*
And this is our punishment.

Even after being given the perfect environment and
unbridled knowledge...
We haven't been able to reach his level...
And now, our master has given up on us.
Th... That...
But...
If this is what you want...
It's my job to fulfill your wishes...
That's the promise I made to you...
Pardon me.
